trans-unit.source: Manages security tokens for the client.
trans-unit.target: 管理用戶端的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: This class handles security token serialization, security token provision and security token authentication for the client.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會處理安全性權杖序列化、 安全性權杖提供和用戶端的安全性權杖驗證。

trans-unit.source: There is one instance of this class for each client channel factory.
trans-unit.target: 沒有此類別的每個用戶端通道處理站的一個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ClientCredentialsSecurityTokenManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.ClientCredentialsSecurityTokenManager"></xref>類別。
<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>
clientCredentialsis .
取得用戶端認證。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> object allows the user to configure client credentials to be used for authentication to the service.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>物件可讓使用者設定要用於以向服務驗證用戶端認證。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>
<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>物件。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>
建立安全性權杖驗證器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator> is responsible for validating security tokens and providing a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> to obtain claims for security tokens that meet the requirements specified in <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.ServiceModelSecurityTokenRequirement>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator>負責驗證安全性權杖及提供<xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy>取得宣告的安全性權杖的需求中指定<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.ServiceModelSecurityTokenRequirement>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.ServiceModelSecurityTokenRequirement> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator>
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回時，包含<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"> </xref>。
這個參數未初始化便傳遞。
<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator"> </xref>物件。
tokenRequirementis .
建立安全性權杖提供者。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> class is responsible for obtaining tokens for a given <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.ServiceModelSecurityTokenRequirement>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>類別會負責取得指定的<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.ServiceModelSecurityTokenRequirement>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.ServiceModelSecurityTokenRequirement>語彙基元</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>

trans-unit.source: Optionally token providers support renewing and canceling tokens as well.
trans-unit.target: （選擇性） 權杖提供者支援更新和取消權杖以及。
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement"></xref>.
<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider"> </xref>物件。
tokenRequirementis .
建立安全性權杖序列化程式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> is used to write and read security tokens, security key identifiers, and security key identifier clauses.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer>用來寫入和讀取安全性權杖、 安全性金鑰識別碼和安全性金鑰識別碼子句。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer>

trans-unit.source: When deserializing the token from XML, the returned token must be able to perform cryptographic operations.
trans-unit.target: 還原序列化時 XML 的權杖，則傳回的權杖必須能夠執行密碼編譯作業。

trans-unit.source: The token serializer therefore must ensure the deserialized token can perform cryptographic operations (Kerberos ticket processing, X.509 decoding, SAML decoding and other operations) but should defer application trust decisions to the security token authenticator.
trans-unit.target: 因此，權杖序列化程式必須確保還原序列化的權杖可以執行密碼編譯作業 （Kerberos 票證處理、 X.509 解碼、 SAML 解碼和其他作業），但應該將延後至安全性權杖驗證器應用程式信任決策。
<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenVersion"> </xref>的安全性權杖。
<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref>物件。
建立安全性權杖序列化程式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> is used to write and read security tokens, security key identifiers and security key identifier clauses.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer>用來寫入和讀取安全性權杖、 安全性金鑰識別碼和安全性金鑰識別碼子句。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer>

trans-unit.source: When deserializing the token from XML, the returned token must be able to perform cryptographic operations.
trans-unit.target: 還原序列化時 XML 的權杖，則傳回的權杖必須能夠執行密碼編譯作業。

trans-unit.source: The token serializer therefore must ensure the deserialized token can perform cryptographic operations (Kerberos ticket processing, X.509 decoding, SAML decoding and other operations) but should defer application trust decisions to the security token authenticator.
trans-unit.target: 因此，權杖序列化程式必須確保還原序列化的權杖可以執行密碼編譯作業 （Kerberos 票證處理、 X.509 解碼、 SAML 解碼和其他作業），但應該將延後至安全性權杖驗證器應用程式信任決策。
<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityVersion>的安全性權杖。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityVersion>
<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified token requirement is an issued security token requirement.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出指定的權杖需求是否為已發出的安全性權杖需求。
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified token requirement is an issued security token requirement; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的權杖需求是已發出的安全性權杖需求，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
requirementis .
